title: Now That I’m Dead, are you Satisfied? - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Death   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Loneliness   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Maids   Manipulative Characters   Multiple POV   Nobles   Religions   Revenge   Royalty   Sibling Rivalry   Stoic Characters
author: Machibari   マチバリ
description:
After being told by the crown prince that their engagement was to be annulled, Countess Lorona died.

Some were relieved that they didn’t have to go through the hassle of the engagement being annulled while the others were happy to get what they wanted for a long time. They thought everything would go well, but the impact of Lorona’s death was massive.>
